full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B CES @023A *, ,BSNYEN DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI NYE 'KHOR BA DKA' BCU SHES DAR BA SOGS DU MA DANG, SNGON GOMS LEGS SBYANG KYI BAG CHAGS THUG PO SAD CING, SKYEBS THOB PA DANG, SBYANGS PA'I RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS RGYAL DBANG DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I GDAN SA CHEN PO RGYAL ME TOG THANG GI SENG GE'I KHRIR 'KHOD PA'I MKHAN PO CHE CHES PA BDE THANG SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG RIN CHEN TSANGS DBYANGS PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA DANG, NANG RIGS PA DANG GSO BA RIG PA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS LA SBYANGS PA MI DMAN ZHING RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PA, SKYE BAS THOB PA'I BLO GROS KYI RTZAL GSUNS RAB LA LTA BA'I MIG DANG LDAN ZHING DON GNYER DAD BCAS PA'I DGE SLONG CHOS RGYA MTSO DANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG LA SOGS PA'I DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR SBRANG BAN SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG BRTZON PA MI DMAN PA'I DGE SLONG GRAGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
